E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 4/3/1990
Subject: Ron Coomer learns new position
Ron Coomer has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director

Subject: Brian Kingman
Brian Kingman is ready to be activated from the DL!

Subject: Cliff Speck healing process
Cliff Speck is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
